about_the_game:
This album contains all the music composed by Jérémie Frémont for 'Rise of the White Sun.'

This soundtrack is ideal for relaxation or for providing ambient music for your Oriental-themed RPGs.

Note: There are two titles composed by Kevin McLeod used in the game ('Opium' and 'Shenyang') that are not included in this album.
